revised_title: Improvements and Critique on Lateral Stone-Removal Operations
tldr: The author, Claud. Nic. Le Cat, discusses various methods of cutting for kidney stones, focusing on the lateral operation. He critiques previous methods, particularly those of Mr. Rau, and proposes improvements to the technique. Le Cat also describes his own method of making an incision into the bladder's body, which he believes has significant potential for success.
